product_name: The North Face Warm Merino Wool Tights - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The soft and efficient Warm Merino Wool tights from The North Face feature FlashDry(TM) technology to move moisture and speed drying times when you're working up a sweat skiing or hiking. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Moisture is pulled off your skin and spread across the surface of the fabric for quick evaporation. Polymer, merino wool and polyester blend is soft next to skin. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion. Fly opening; elastic waist. Closeout.
short_description: The soft and efficient Warm Merino Wool tights from The North Face feature FlashDry(TM) technology to move moisture and speed drying times when you're working up a sweat skiing or hiking.
